knimeNode.name: Open in R
knimeNode.shortDescription: Opens R session with R workspace from KNIME.

fullDescription.intro:
This node opens a local R session and pushes the R workspace from KNIME into R.
Make sure that Rserve is running somewhere, and KNIME is accordingly configured (KNIME->Preferences).
Detailed documentation about the R generic nodes:
Wiki on GitHub: knime-scripting

ports.inPort: R workspace, which should be pushed to R.
